name: The Minimalist Perfecting Complexion Foundation and Concealer Stick
about: What it is:u00a0A buildable, lightweight complexion stick that can be used as a foundation or a concealer for easy, natural-looking coverage on the go...Coverage:u00a0Medium.Finish:u00a0Natural.Formulation:u00a0Stick.Highlighted Ingredients:u00a0- Fatty Acids: Condition skin and lock in moisture..- Sea Daffodil Extract: Diminishes the look of dark spots and pigmentation...Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This lightweight, buildable formula wears comfortably throughout the day without creasing or settling into fine lines, so itu2019s suitable for all skin types, including acne-prone skin. The precise, rounded tip makes it easy to apply to small areas, so you can use it all over for full coverage or to make small edits only where you need to...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: - Fatty Acids: Condition skin and lock in moisture..- Sea Daffodil Extract: Diminishes the look of dark spots and pigmentation....Hydrogenated Polydecene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Synthetic Wax, Dipentaerythrityl Hexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Cire de Carnauba), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Cera Microcristallina (Microcrystalline Wax, Cire Microcristalline), Sorbitan Isostearate, Pancratium Maritimum Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Glycerin, Aqua (Water, Eau), Mica. May Contain (+/-): CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) ...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Prep skin with 1-2 pumps of Great Skinu2122 Instant Glow Serum with Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid (sold separately) and Great Skinu2122 Priming And Firming Moisturizer With Peptides And Hyaluronic Acid (sold separately) before applying The Minimalist directly onto the skin. .- Use it all all over or only where you need it and blend using Brush No. 1 Tapered Blending Brush (sold separately) or your finger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color match was spot on but otherwise this product did not work for me at all. It sits dryly when applied and required a lot of blending.  Within a couple of hours my face was broken out in multiple places. in mug everyoneu2019s

reviews.review_title: A truly impressive under eye coverage!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Impressive coverage. Itu2019s thick and in one layer covers as much as any liquid concealer would in 2 or 3. I have pretty dark pigmentation under my eyes and i was after a full coverage concealer that would still feel light weight and breathable. So far Iu2019m really impressed with how this one sits and blends into a very natural look.   TIP : if you have dark under eyes like me and want to cover them in one layer, apply the concealer to fully cover the dark areas and wait 2-5 mins for it to dry. Then buff it a bit and it will melt into your skin without compromising the coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure of this product because of the price but I'm impressed! The undertone is perfect for my skin tone (wich is rare for me normally everything looks too orange) I love it and will definitely rebuy later

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly an incredible product !! It has such good coverage yet it dosent look cakey, it blends in seamlessly, and i found the perfect shade that matches my skin tone .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin, this product looked horrible. It was dry and oily simultaneously and it congealed around dry patches I didnu2019t know I had. I really wanted to like it, but I couldnu2019t manage to make it work

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for about 2 weeks and I loveeee it. Itu2019s so easy to blend and the match is perfect for my skin. Although I would recommend going into the store and swatching it because the original one I bought was so orange

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So so natural! Itu2019s my go to for everyday makeup looks because it blends seamlessly and feels so lightweight. It covers up dark spots and blemishes well, usually doing the job in one or two layers! I love how convenient it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really liking this so far. Has light-medium coverage and matches my skin tone perfectly. Gives me exactly what I need on my no makeup makeup days.

reviews.review_title: Skip it, not worth the hype.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like everyone love this product but I regret buying it. The consistency is smooth but it cakes onto the skin in an obvious way and is by no means a conspicuous concealer. I bought the haus labs concealer around the same time and prefer that one far more. It is convenient because it is a stick but the formula is not worth it in my opinion :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!!!  Great for older, (50+) combination skin. Non drying and sensitive skin friendly. No smell and glides like butter. Little goes a long way and the price is great! Hides spots and uneven tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect every day foundation and concealer. I love this for my combo skin and itu2019s the perfect shade!

reviews.review_title: Unfortunately I bought into the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I saw the marketing videos and for me it looked so fantastic I  splurged and bought it, maybe the buildup in my head was too much to live up to, but it is not groundbreaking. The color match was okaying, but itu2019s just not a no makeup look product like I thought. Its a weird type of obvious texture for my skin even with prep and I feel like I have more coverage with a tinted sunscreen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I am 46. I honestly can't remember the last time I had a zit, let alone a breakout. The first time I used this (along with their bronzer, highlighter, and blush), I woke up the next day to several deep whiteheads (I thoroughly cleanse my skin every night), which eventually turned into full-blown red irritated zits. This was the only new product I used. I only wore it out to dinner, so it was only on my skin for several hours. It took almost a month for the breakout to heal, and I still have red marks where the zits were. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was difficult for me to find a good shade match for someone with a deeper skin tone and neutral undertones. I knew this would have very light coverage but I noticed no difference after putting it on. Definitely not worth the $38.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I loved this product. Then I started to use it and it was breaking me out around my nose. This was weird because Merit is supposed to be a clean line. Overall, it had great coverage, but for its money I was not happy when it broke me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the packaging is horrible within an hour of buying this the product SNAPPED IN HALF IN ITS OWN PACKAGING before I even used it, for the price the packaging should be so much better. product is amazing though so creamy and so blendable i woth the packaging was better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the shade u201ccreamu201d and found the shade too light, even though Iu2019m pale/fair. I didnu2019t like the consistency either: It didnu2019t sit well on my skin, despite my skin being quite good. It ended up being cakey even if I spot concealed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Perfect for travel; nice enough for everyday

The formulation is buttery, seamless blending and a lovely variety of colors. My angry and sensitive skin takes it well:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome! You donu2019t even need a brush. I love it a lot, just make sure your skin is moisturized beforehand.

Iu2019m now using it for spot coverage until it is done and I wonu2019t repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: The first time I used the product it broke off the top and flew across the room. I put it back on but it constantly falls off and never consistently blends. I liked it at first but would not buy ever again. For something of this price it should have a stronger build

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Itu2019s super natural and easy to apply. Iu2019m able to apply to my face and rub in while holding a screaming child. My skin is on the dry side and itu2019s been great for me. The worker said some people return it if they have oily skin.

reviews.review_title: Ne pas acheter, ne vaut pas la peine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is awesome. After YEARS of wearing foundation it actually got me to not slather something on my entire face because it blends so well. The application works great with a brush but also blends nicely w/ a finger. I bought Bisque as well and use two together for a full face. The finish is perfect, blurry but not too dry. It will catch on some dry skin but I'd rather that then it turn my already oil skin oilier. I'd say if you have oily or combo skin give this a try, just go easy around dry areas. Will absolutely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Came for the packaging stayed for the quality

I also use this as concealer, foundation, or as a quick skin enhancer on days I have ten minutes to get ready. Truly multitasking and a great purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect choice if your skin is prone to breaking out! It is really lightweight and has good coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, itu2019s creamy and goes on well for a more natural look. I got shade dune and it was a perfect match for me.

reviews.review_title: Surprised to love it - but I do!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wasnu2019t expecting to like this but took a chance, and I love it. I am in my late 40u2019s with dry, sensitive skin and usually have problems color matching. I went in store to get help with the color match and ended up needing to order it online bc they were out of my shade. I use their primer/moisturizer immediately before I apply it and use it to correct my ruddy cheeks. smile lines and under my eyes. It goes on smoothly and stays in place all day. Iu2019m definitely a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who likes to wear makeup but not feel it, this complexion stick has been the best thing Iu2019ve ever put on my face. As a person of color, I struggle with finding shades that will work for me without looking ashy. This product just glides and melts into your skin making it look like my skin but better. Application is super easy making it beginner friendly. If you were looking for a sign to purchase, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the concept and how it blends and everything about the formula. However, the entire stick broke and came out of the tube. I wish it was a more secure and stable product for how expensive it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail! I have combo acne prone skin and this looks just like skin when I wear it. Personally, I apply it to my face with the stick and then blend it with my fingers by tapping to help melt it into my skin, I don't rub. I add more product to dark spots where needed, it truly is a 2-in-2 product. It doesn't easily come off like water-based products do, and I use DHL cleansing oil to take it off. If my skin is dry (winter time) it will patch slightly, but with frequently exfoliating or gently scrubbing my face with a damp wash cloth before applying I can avoid that. I also set it with loose powder. Does not break me out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used it once and with the stick barely out. Put it away and went to open it next and the whole stick fell out. And it wonu2019t go back well to use right. Never left in anything heated to melt it. Idk why it broke. Better for concealer than foundation which is what. I bought it for so that sucks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely blown away by this product!! I am a fair and sensitive skinned gal. I have struggled with acne in various forms for over ten years now. This is genuinely the first makeup product that truly checks all of my boxes. It has no poor clogging ingredients (no hidden ones either!), it blends perfectly into my skin, no itching or caking at the end of the dayu2026 and I could just go on! I will be using this product for a long long time. And lastly, I use an off brand blending brush and it works wonderfully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I donu2019t need to set it and it looks flawless!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Makeup newbie and dry skin approved
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very new at makeup, just started in my 40s to cover up new blemishes and dark spots. I have bought and tried various concealers and formulas, and somehow this is what I always reach for in a cinch, when I don't feel like doing finicky prep and extra work to prevent creasing. It has a luminous finish on me and it's 1-2-done. I use it over my regular moisturizer and a brush, under and all around the eyes, and on any needed spots. I just wish there were some olive options, but this worked okay and most brands don't have olive options anyway. I have dry skin and with just the moisturizer underneath I have had the least issues with this creasing and showing dry patches than anything else I have used. It's so creamy and satisfying too, it's like coloring over your issues with a big crayon. No smell. Hope it works for you, everyone's skin is so different, but I am very glad I tried it. Of all the other things I bought, this will be the one I re-buy so I hope they don't change it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The actual foundation keeps falling out of the stick- super annoying. I find applying this rather difficult, it takes a lot to blend this in, certainly not quick and easy.  Doesn't work for an under eye concealer for my mature eyes and is too light in coverage to cover any sort of darkness.  If this were to replace face concealer, eye concealer and foundation, I would need to buy 3 different colors.  Otherwise, it doesn't have a scent for those that need to know, is light coverage , can build slightly but not much, and I think would only work on those with almost perfect skin. Suggest swatching colors before purchase, online matching is off, especially for light to light-medium shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's very creamy and glides on smoothly. The match is very good for me. I mainly use it to conceal, but sometimes I use it as a foundation. Warning for those who want full coverage and long-lasting wear: This will not be that product for you. I think that this is medium coverage and you can build it to be full coverage, but I feel it would get heavy. Additionally, this is a cream product that will move on the face and transfer if you touch it. I haven't tried it with a primer yet so maybe those issues could be mitigated, but if you're a makeup minimalist and want full coverage and transfer-proof this isn't for you. Additionally, some people have reported that their product fell out shortly after use, but mine hasn't yet. I'm not that gentle with it and the base of the stick does have a small crack, but seems to have held up so far. Maybe it's because I bought it in-store so it didn't get messed up in shipping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased Suede for under eye & Buff for all over foundation/concealer.   While the colors & formula work well for my skin, this is an absolute no on repurchasing! One of the color sticks broke during the first use & the other broke after 2 or 3 uses. These were NOT turned up (since they come sticking out enough when first opened) nor did I use the pressure of a toddler with a crayon learning to color. They just BROKE FOR NO REASON...TWICE...because I returned the first one that broke. (Didn't have the mental energy to go back for a second return so I tried to fix them on my own. A fail, btw.)   They really need to fix this as well as the packaging. With regards to the packaging, the cap is very tight which is good because that means it's not going to just fall off. However, because about half an inch of the product comes already exposed/turned up in the tube, you have to be RIDICULOUSLY CAREFUL when pulling the tight cap off because it will hit the exposed product. So you end up with nicks in the product & color all over the inside of the cap.  This costs too much money for these kinds of quality issues.  Love my Merit bronzing stick though. They should mimic that kind of packaging & set up for this foundation/concealer stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see new, 'neutral' shades and I was curious about using the cafe au lait, very cool, almost grey looking Jute.  I actually was hoping this would work as a contour for me, since most contours are too warm or too saturated.  I have fair skin with cool undertones and I could rent my skin out for science experiments looking to prove neutrality.  This comes up like just about every product claiming to be neutral -not at all neutral!  It's a very toasty apricot.   They are still lacking real, true, desaturated, almost grey neutrals and the photography is deceptive.  I could tell this was going to be orange the moment I took the cap off.  My experiment failed and this will go in the drawer with all the other non-neutral neutrals.    I wrote a review back when Merit first introduced this stick.  In it, I crunched the numbers on how this is basically the most expensive foundation stick out there, gram for gram.  If you love it, you might think it's worth it.  Otherwise, I'd probably look elsewhere.  I find the formula a tad dry on my normal-dry skin, but better (though actually more $$) than WA. You must prep very well.

reviews.review_text: Had such high hopes but it's just not it. It's very drying and even if your skin is oily, it pills a lot due to this, and no matter how you adjust your skin care before putting it on. I had to exchange this product three times(!!!) because no matter what, the foundation stick product kept breaking from the holder. And because of the short lid, the product flings out and multiple times landed on the floor but I kept exchanging because I thought it was worth it. The Merit foundation blending brush that goes with this however, is amazing. And works well with other products. I ended up getting Hourglass's foundation stick and it is much more creamy and works well with combination skin - I can get oily in my t-zone and dry cheeks and it still works incredibly well and you don't need a lot at all. Merit's product felt like you needed a lot to get a good blend which would just cause further pilling and streaking. If you like a thicker look in your skin, this can't handle that at all. On the other hand, as is promoted, if you want a more natural look, this doesn't achieve that because it pills so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have light skin with cool undertones + redness and most complexion products are either too pale or too orange for me. The Minimalist in Dune is the best complexion match I have ever found and for that I commend Merit. The products is super blendable and melts into the skin with minimal effort. I can't see or feel it on my skin (an issue I have with most foundations), it doesn't suck the moisture out of my skin, doesn't cake, and it mostly doesn't highlight dry spots. It truly looks and feels like skin. However, it doesn't improve the appearance of the skin, doesn't have any blurring qualities and just doesn't give that your skin but better look that other foundations and tints do (e.g., Lisa Eldridge's skin tint). For this reason, I think it's great for day-to-day but it's not something I would reach for on special occasions or if I wanted to make an impression.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't matter if I spot conceal or go for full coverage, this foundation stick makes me look great each and every time. It never fails. The shade match is perfection. I have tried the Basma Foundation stick and Hourglass foundation stick, but nothing compares to this beauty. I do recommend using the Merit Great Skin serum before applying this foundation stick. the two put together are chef's kiss.

reviews.review_title: Perfect skin in the palm of your hand

reviews.review_text: The component alone makes a 10/10. The fact that it's compact, travel friendly and an all-in-one complexion perfector is everything. In all honesty, I was afraid of how heavy or cakey this would feel on my skin as my skin type is dry and I'm a liquid/skin tint kind of girl but once I started warming it up on the back of my hand before applying it, it changed the game!

reviews.review_title: Such a natural and blendable product!

reviews.review_text: Love how this blends so naturally, and helps minimize my dark circles, i typically use it on the go and throw it in my purse for quick touch ups and cover ups. reviews.review_text: I returned the Westman Atelier stick and purchased this one. This is so much better! it lasts all day and is very creamy on my drier skin.  100% will repurchase. Try it!

reviews.review_text: This product is a staple in my makeup kit, it gives the most natural no-makeup-makeup look while still being full coverage at the same time. reviews.review_text: Best product ever. Period. Replaced both my concealer and foundation, for effortless and subtle coverage, that is easily buildable this is a win. If you're debating, just get it.
